<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Subscribe to discussion"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/project/message/{messageid:[0-9]+}/subscribe"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Subscribes to the notifications about the actions performed in the discussion with the selected message.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"messageid":{"description":"Message ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
